ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Dust scattering out of the beam. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A modification of a spectrum due to scattering-off dust on the line-of-sight. The model assumes that the scattered flux goes into a uniform disk whose size has a 1/E dependence and whose total flux has a 1/E^2 dependence.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: size of halo at 1 keV in units of the detector beamsize

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
